programme.title: Winters Hidden Wonders T1 - Ep. 3
programme.desc: Winter in Europe sees temperatures plummet to minus 40 degrees; wildlife pushed to the extreme. Animals here have little choice but to adapt or die.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations T1 - Ep. 7
programme.desc: Owls can see with their ears?and may be able to hear if a mouse is pregnant..and the rhinoceros has skin that sweats blood..

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations T1 - Ep. 8
programme.desc: Frogs may just be the key to human immortality while the cats purrs may help keep astronauts alive in space..

programme.title: Winters Hidden Wonders T1 - Ep. 3
programme.desc: Winter in Europe sees temperatures plummet to minus 40 degrees; wildlife pushed to the extreme. Animals here have little choice but to adapt or die.

programme.title: Dolphins Up Close With Bertie Gregory - Ep. 1
programme.desc: Bertie Gregory is in the Azores, a marine sanctuary and vital pitstop for migrating ocean predators off the coast of Portugal. It’s feeding season, as thousands of normally elusive predators join forces to hunt and feed on super-shoals of fish known as bait balls. A vast ocean and battling storms challenge the team for a chance to film the most spectacular feeding frenzy of Bertie’s career.

programme.title: Frozen Islands T1 - Ep. 2
programme.desc: In the Southern Indian and Pacific Oceans, Crozet, Heard, Auckland and Enderby, Macquarie and Campbell Islands are home to some of the rarest Sub-Antarctic animals on Earth: Royal and Yellow-eyed Penguins, New Zealand Sea Lion and the Southern Right Whales.

programme.title: Winters Hidden Wonders T1 - Ep. 3
programme.desc: Winter in Europe sees temperatures plummet to minus 40 degrees; wildlife pushed to the extreme. Animals here have little choice but to adapt or die.

programme.title: Dolphins Up Close With Bertie Gregory - Ep. 1
programme.desc: Bertie Gregory is in the Azores, a marine sanctuary and vital pitstop for migrating ocean predators off the coast of Portugal. It’s feeding season, as thousands of normally elusive predators join forces to hunt and feed on super-shoals of fish known as bait balls. A vast ocean and battling storms challenge the team for a chance to film the most spectacular feeding frenzy of Bertie’s career.

programme.title: Wild Life: Resurrection Island - Ep. 1
programme.desc: National Geographic wildlife filmmaker Bertie Gregory goes on an adventure to the iconic South Georgia Island. This island has one of the highest concentration of wildlife on the planet. .

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol T18 - Ep. 20
programme.desc: The PVS staff make sure every animal has a fighting chance. From tiny puppies and rabbits, large cows and horses, and creepy crawlies, on this episode of The Incredible Dr. Pol, it’s a fun mix of, “aww,” “wow,” and “yuck!” The vets are out on farms calls! Dr. Pol tangles with a feisty angus bull, pregnancy checks a herd at House Dairy, and pays a visit to Clay Knob to look at a cow with a peculiar problem. .

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol T19 - Ep. 2
programme.desc: On this episode of The Incredible Dr. Pol, Doc dodges kicks from a choking mare, Dr. Brenda hoofs it to a limping cow, and Dr. Lisa treats a wobbly steer. At the clinic, the docs face a deluge of dogs: a Chihuahua with a broken leg, a pregnant pooch that looks ready to burst, and a Doberman with mysterious bumps on his face. From mules to mutts, the vets have it covered.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol T18 - Ep. 14
programme.desc: Drs. Lisa and Pol are on hand to assist during a horse’s emergency delivery, and Dr. Brenda examines a calf born during subfreezing temperatures..

programme.title: Winters Hidden Wonders T1 - Ep. 2
programme.desc: Winters savage conditions are the ultimate test for Asias wildlife. Only the most resilient and resourceful animals survive until spring..

programme.title: Winters Hidden Wonders T1 - Ep. 1
programme.desc: The harsh elements of the Americas winter push animals to their limits. Only the toughest and most resourceful survive.

programme.title: Winters Hidden Wonders T1 - Ep. 3
programme.desc: Winter in Europe sees temperatures plummet to minus 40 degrees; wildlife pushed to the extreme. Animals here have little choice but to adapt or die.

programme.title: Europes New Wild T1 - Ep. 6
programme.desc: Sami reindeer herders and modern conservationists are teaming up in a bid to save one of Europes wildest frontiers. Through ice and snow, the link between man and wild is being reforged..

programme.title: Winter Of The Bear - Ep. 1
programme.desc: In the forests of northern Finland, survival is a race against the seasons. For a mother brown bear, life between winters is a relentless battle as a single mother. She wakes from hibernation, thin and weary, to guide cubs through a fleeting summer. They need food, and she’ll teach them everything, not least of all, avoiding dangerous males during mating season and facing wolves in a deadly fight for food.

programme.title: Race To Winter - Ep. 1
programme.desc: As the first light of spring touches snow-covered landscapes, the race begins. Across fjords, forests, mountains and tundra, animals emerge from hiding to take advantage of summer’s fleeting generosity. But the clock is ticking, and winter is never far away.

programme.title: Wild Winter - Ep. 1
programme.desc: Winter is here. Ready or not, creatures big and small endure the harshest and most unforgiving season on the planet. Some cling to life in these bitter months…while others see opportunity on the ice. In this one-hour special, wildlife around the globe fights tooth and nail to survive the winter season, against a striking frozen backdrop.

programme.title: Snow School - Ep. 1
programme.desc: When every day is a snow day, school is always in session! Snowy climates can make for harsh living, and adulting is hard no matter where you are, but these young are flourishing; a baby walrus gets a swim lesson from Mom, young stoats’ playtime teaches them how to hunt, otter pups take a slide and learn to avoid predators, and owlets practice leaving the nest.
